title: BRIEF-The Bon-Ton Stores Inc Announces Bankruptcy Court Approval Of Winning Bid
text:
April 18 (Reuters) -
* THE BON-TON STORES, INC. ANNOUNCES BANKRUPTCY COURT APPROVAL OF WINNING BID
* BON-TON STORES - U.S. BANKRUPTCY COURT APPROVED ASSET PURCHASE AGREEMENT BETWEEN CO AND A JOINT VENTURE
* BON-TON STORES INC - UNDER APPROVED AGREEMENT, JOINT VENTURE GROUP WILL ACQUIRE INVENTORY AND CERTAIN OTHER ASSETS OF COMPANY
* BON-TON STORES INC - JOINT VENTURE WAS WINNING BID IN AN AUCTION HELD PURSUANT TO SECTION 363 OF U.S. BANKRUPTCY CODE ON APRIL 16-17, 2018
